name: Drill The Mob Out
description:
Game made in 3 hrs for Trijam #209, Fullscreen recommended

Theme is Missing Context  -  You are the drill and you must destroy the mob...

  • Click and hold left click to move, aim with the mouse
  • Some mobsters throw cherry bombs
  • Use momentum to propel yourself higher into the air
  • Helicopter helicopter

Note: I forgot to put in an asset I had made during the work period of the jam (the skin for the normal mobster) so I re-uploaded the game. If that's not okay I left the other zip in this project and can make that the one that plays in the browser. 

Originally I wanted to do 'pockets of resistance' as my theme where you drill out spaces underground where you can be safe, but as I started making the game I quickly realized it would take longer than 3 hrs to do, so I went with missing context and said u drill kill mob.
